Posts.Content: Moonwillow1010 wrote: I was diagnosed with IDC on 3/15/12 and met with the surgeon yesterday. He wants me to take a week to decide what to do. My lump is less than 2cm and the adjacent node was negative according to the biopsy. My two surgery choices are Lumpectory w/Radiation or Mastectomy without. He said that both cure rates with either surgery are the same. I am TERRIFIED of doctors and needles etc. but will of course put the big girl panties on. However, I am leaning towards the Lumpectomy w/Rad. He tells me that he believes my nodes are ok BUT won't know until after surgery. Can I please get some advice on weighing out the options? I see surgeon again next week. Oncotype DX Score 28 Dx 3/15/2012, IDC, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 4/23/2012 Lumpectomy: Right Chemotherapy 7/13/2012 Cytoxan (cyclophosphamide), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 10/24/2012 Breast Log in to post a reply
